title.rendered: SIGG x 3PL | Modern design meets modern order fulfilment

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]Innovative Swiss water bottle designer SIGG Switzerland AG and order fulfilment and logistics experts 3PL have announced a perfect fit partnership. 3PL will provide a range of fulfilment solutions across multiple channels for the award winning product designer.

The company is famous because of the iconic shape of its classic bottle and has won multiple design and innovation awards for its reusable aluminium drinking bottles, leading to its addition to a permanent design collection at the New York Museum of Modern Art and determined the “World’s toughest water bottle” by Backpacker Magazine.

3PL will be supporting SIGG’s order fulfilment strategy, providing direct to consumer, retail and Amazon fulfilment solutions that will ensure SIGG customer’s experience a delivery experience that compliments their reputation as a brand that symbolises quality, safety and trust.

We are very proud to be associated with this prestigious brand, “John Scully, Business Development Manager at 3PL commented “With our specialism in health and wellbeing products, SIGG are an excellent fit for our ever-widening range of order fulfilment and related solutions.”

Stuart Theobald, Head of Sales at SIGG said “After our previous partner unexpectedly went bankrupt, we had to find a fulfilment centre ASAP to ensure that we could continue to supply our customers.  We also wanted to take this opportunity to find a new partner that would reduce the work my team has to do and would offer us long term support and growth potential.  After searching for, and visiting several different partners, we settled on 3PL as they were clearly more suited for the mix of business that we have within our product and customers portfolio.”, Stuart continued “Clearly they are a very professional company who have just opened another warehouse giving us the confidence that, as an organisation, they are well suited to support us”.

To shop the latest range of SIGG products, visit www.sigg.com

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq.ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of global warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 9 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

SIGG – “The art of hydration. Excellence since 1908.”

Premium bottle brand, SIGG, has been creating safe, durable and stylish reusable water bottles since 1908.

Enjoyed by drinkers globally, its 111 year history has seen SIGG become the leading Swiss bottle brand well-known for its design, innovation and long-lasting quality.

SIGG’s iconic designs are stylish yet survive the daily adventure. Its product portfolio includes bottles that are in-tune with the latest and emerging lifestyle and homewares trends alongside those that can withstand the impact of outdoor activities and sports.

Designed with the highest level of safety and sustainability in mind, SIGG bottles are BPA and EA free; they are made from polypropylene, stainless steel, glass and tritan and are fully recyclable.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
